mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_stock(stock_id, goods_id, shelfdate, `number`, supplier_id, updatetime) VALUES (#{stock.stockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stock.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock.shelfdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stock.number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock.supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT tb_stock.id, stock_id AS stockId, goods_id AS goodsId, shelfdate, `number`, supplier_id AS supplierId, tb_stock.updatetime, tb_supplier.name AS supplierName, tb_production.name AS productionName FROM tb_stock LEFT JOIN tb_supplier ON supplier_id = tb_supplier.id LEFT JOIN tb_goods ON tb_goods.id = goods_id LEFT JOIN tb_production ON tb_goods.production_id = tb_production.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order(user_id, number, status, time, price, updatetime) VALUES (#{order.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{order.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, now())

insert into tb_order_item (order_id, goods_id, number, price, updatetime) values (#{orderItem.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderItem.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderItem.number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderItem.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, now())

insert into tb_order_item_shipment (order_item_id, stock_id, number, updatetime) values (#{orderItemShipment.orderItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderItemShipment.stockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderItemShipment.number,jdbcType=INTEGER},now())
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(name,color_name) AS GoodsName FROM tb_goods LEFT JOIN tb_production ON tb_production.id = tb_goods.production_id WHERE tb_goods.id = #{goodsID}
